Traffic Control

This control is available in the optional “traffic” package.

Summary
Traffic ControlThis control is available in the optional “traffic” package.
MQA.TrafficControlCreates the traffic control to interactively control traffic functionality.

MQA.TrafficControl

Creates the traffic control to interactively control traffic functionality.

Parameters

buttonPositionOptional (MQA.MapCornerPlacement)
legendPositionOptional (MQA.MapCornerPlacement)

Extends

MQA.Base

Properties

These properties can be manipulated via the MQA.Base.setValue, MQA.Base.setValues, and MQA.Base.getValue functions.

position(MQA.MapCornerPlacement) The position of the traffic button.
legendPosition(MQA.MapCornerPlacement) The position of the traffic legend.
legendIconImages(array) Array of MQA.Icon to use for the legend icons.  Must have the same number of elements as legendIconText.  Icons should be all the same size and no larger than 22 x 20.
legendIconText(array) Array of strings corresponding to the legendIconImages.  Must have the same number of elements as legendIconImages.
legendIconsVisible(boolean) Whether the legend icons are visible.
legendFlowVisible(boolean) Whether the legend flow information is visible.
legendHelpLinkVisible(boolean) Whether the help link is visible.
legendCheckboxes(array) 3-element array of boolean specifying what checkboxes to show.  The checkbox order is incidents, construction, events.
legendSliderVisible(boolean) Whether the flow opacity slider is visible.
